content: I wouldn't lose any sleep over it just yet. In the first place, the Christian Action Network is pretty far out itself. Visit their website and see what they have to offer: 'chrisitanaction.org' And, it's sort of the like the pot calling the kettle black: 'http://www.kelticklankirk.com/militias_christian_identity.htm' 'http://christianmilitia.net/'
